name: CUSTOM Hero #19
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius
  
  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign layout_gap = section.settings.layout_gap
  assign layout_gap_mobile = section.settings.layout_gap_mobile
  assign layout_mt = section.settings.layout_mt
  assign layout_mt_mobile = section.settings.layout_mt_mobile

  assign image = section.settings.image
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile

  assign navigation_align = section.settings.navigation_align
  assign navigation_align_mobile = section.settings.navigation_align_mobile

  assign navigation_horizontal_align = ""
  if navigation_align == "center"
    assign navigation_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif navigation_align == "right"
    assign navigation_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign navigation_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign navigation_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if navigation_align_mobile == "center"
    assign navigation_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif navigation_align_mobile == "right"
    assign navigation_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign navigation_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif
  
  assign text = section.settings.text
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_align = section.settings.text_align
  assign text_align_mobile = section.settings.text_align_mobile

  assign navigation_gap = section.settings.navigation_gap  
  assign navigation_gap_mobile = section.settings.navigation_gap_mobile
  assign navigation_mt = section.settings.navigation_mt  
  assign navigation_mt_mobile = section.settings.navigation_mt_mobile

  assign arrow_padding_horizontal = section.settings.arrow_padding_horizontal
  assign arrow_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.arrow_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign arrow_padding_vertical = section.settings.arrow_padding_vertical
  assign arrow_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.arrow_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_color = section.settings.arrow_icon_color
  assign arrow_icon_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_icon_hover_color

  assign products = section.settings.products

  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt
  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile

  assign slide_image_radius = section.settings.slide_image_radius
  assign slide_image_border_thickness = section.settings.slide_image_border_thickness
  assign slide_image_border_color = section.settings.slide_image_border_color
  assign slide_image_ratio = section.settings.slide_image_ratio
  assign slide_image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.slide_image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_hover = section.settings.image_hover

  assign slide_content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.slide_content_padding_horizontal
  assign slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign slide_content_padding_vertical = section.settings.slide_content_padding_vertical
  assign slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign slide_content_align = section.settings.slide_content_align
  assign slide_content_align_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_align_mobile

  assign slide_content_horizontal_align = ""
  if slide_content_align == "center"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif slide_content_align == "right"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if slide_content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif slide_content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif
  
  assign slide_title_custom = section.settings.slide_title_custom
  assign slide_title_font = section.settings.slide_title_font
  assign slide_title_size = section.settings.slide_title_size
  assign slide_title_size_mobile = section.settings.slide_title_size_mobile
  assign slide_title_height = section.settings.slide_title_height
  assign slide_title_color = section.settings.slide_title_color   

  assign slide_button = section.settings.slide_button
  assign slide_button_size = section.settings.slide_button_size
  assign slide_button_size_mobile = section.settings.slide_button_size_mobile
  assign slide_button_color = section.settings.slide_button_color
  assign slide_button_hover_color = section.settings.slide_button_hover_color
  assign slide_button_custom = section.settings.slide_button_custom
  assign slide_button_font = section.settings.slide_button_font
  assign slide_button_height = section.settings.slide_button_height
  assign slide_button_padding_vertical = section.settings.slide_button_padding_vertical
  assign slide_button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.slide_button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign slide_button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.slide_button_padding_horizontal
  assign slide_button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.slide_button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign slide_button_radius = section.settings.slide_button_radius
  assign slide_button_border_thickness = section.settings.slide_button_border_thickness
  assign slide_button_border_color = section.settings.slide_button_border_color
  assign slide_button_border_hover_color = section.settings.slide_button_border_hover_color
  assign slide_button_bg_color = section.settings.slide_button_bg_color
  assign slide_button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.slide_button_bg_hover_color
  assign slide_button_style = section.settings.slide_button_style
  assign slide_button_mt = section.settings.slide_button_mt
  assign slide_button_mt_mobile = section.settings.slide_button_mt_mobile

  assign bottom_mt = section.settings.bottom_mt
  assign bottom_mt_mobile = section.settings.bottom_mt_mobile

  assign bottom_text = section.settings.bottom_text
  assign bottom_text_custom = section.settings.bottom_text_custom
  assign bottom_text_font = section.settings.bottom_text_font
  assign bottom_text_size = section.settings.bottom_text_size
  assign bottom_text_size_mobile = section.settings.bottom_text_size_mobile
  assign bottom_text_height = section.settings.bottom_text_height
  assign bottom_text_color = section.settings.bottom_text_color
  assign bottom_text_max_width = section.settings.bottom_text_max_width
  assign bottom_text_max_width_mobile = section.settings.bottom_text_max_width_mobile

  assign bottom_button = section.settings.bottom_button
  assign bottom_button_url = section.settings.bottom_button_url
  assign bottom_button_size = section.settings.bottom_button_size
  assign bottom_button_size_mobile = section.settings.bottom_button_size_mobile
  assign bottom_button_color = section.settings.bottom_button_color
  assign bottom_button_hover_color = section.settings.bottom_button_hover_color
  assign bottom_button_custom = section.settings.bottom_button_custom
  assign bottom_button_font = section.settings.bottom_button_font
  assign bottom_button_height = section.settings.bottom_button_height
  assign bottom_button_padding_vertical = section.settings.bottom_button_padding_vertical
  assign bottom_button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.bottom_button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign bottom_button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.bottom_button_padding_horizontal
  assign bottom_button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.bottom_button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign bottom_button_radius = section.settings.bottom_button_radius
  assign bottom_button_border_thickness = section.settings.bottom_button_border_thickness
  assign bottom_button_border_color = section.settings.bottom_button_border_color
  assign bottom_button_border_hover_color = section.settings.bottom_button_border_hover_color
  assign bottom_button_bg_color = section.settings.bottom_button_bg_color
  assign bottom_button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.bottom_button_bg_hover_color
  assign bottom_button_style = section.settings.bottom_button_style
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ slide_title_font |  font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ slide_button_font |  font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ bottom_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ bottom_button_font |  font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .hero-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .hero-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;    
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 700;
  }  

  .hero-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;   
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    align-items: center;
    gap: {{ layout_gap_mobile }}px;
    margin-top: {{ layout_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .hero-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .hero-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .hero-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .hero-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .hero-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
  }

  .hero-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;    
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }  

  .hero-slide-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ navigation_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ navigation_mt_mobile }}px;
    gap: {{ navigation_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .hero-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .hero-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ arrow_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ arrow_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ arrow_bg_color }};    
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;   
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hero-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(180deg);
  }

  .hero-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .hero-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .hero-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .hero-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    fill: {{ arrow_icon_color }};
  }

  .hero-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
  .hero-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};    
  }

  .hero-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .hero-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    fill: {{ arrow_icon_hover_color }};
  }

  .hero-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .hero-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
    pointer-events: none;
  }

  .hero-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
  }

  .hero-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0 !important;
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  .hero-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: {{ slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    padding: {{ slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
  }

  .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ slide_image_radius }}px;
    border: {{ slide_image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ slide_image_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {  
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .hero-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;   
    font-size: {{ slide_title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ slide_title_color }};
    line-height: {{ slide_title_height }}%;
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }
  
  .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: fit-content;    
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ slide_button_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ slide_button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ slide_button_color }};
    line-height: {{ slide_button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ slide_button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ slide_button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ slide_button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .hero-slide-button-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ slide_button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
  }

  .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ slide_button_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ slide_button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }   

  .hero-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ bottom_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 15px;
  }

  .hero-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} {
    width: {{ bottom_text_max_width_mobile }}%;
  }

  .hero-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;    
    font-size: {{ bottom_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ bottom_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ bottom_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }  

  .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: fit-content;    
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ bottom_button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ bottom_button_color }};
    line-height: {{ bottom_button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ bottom_button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ bottom_button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ bottom_button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .hero-bottom-button-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ bottom_button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
  }

  .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ bottom_button_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ bottom_button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .hero-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }
  
    .hero-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .hero-body-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
      gap: {{ layout_gap }}px;
      margin-top: {{ layout_mt }}px;
    }    

    .hero-text-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
    }
    
    .hero-text-{{ section.id }} * {      
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }  

    .hero-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px;    
    }

    .hero-slide-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ navigation_horizontal_align }};
      margin-top: {{ navigation_mt }}px;
      gap: {{ navigation_gap }}px;
    }
    
    .hero-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .hero-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ arrow_padding_vertical }}px {{ arrow_padding_horizontal }}px; 
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;   
    }    

    .hero-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-direction: row;      
      align-items: center;
      padding: {{ slide_content_padding_vertical }}px {{ slide_content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .hero-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {  
      text-align: {{ slide_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ slide_title_size }}px;
      margin-right: 4px;
    }

    .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: 0;
      padding: {{ slide_button_padding_vertical }}px {{ slide_button_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ slide_button_size }}px;
    }

    .hero-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-direction: row;
      margin-top: {{ bottom_mt }}px;
    }

    .hero-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ bottom_text_max_width }}%;
    }

    .hero-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} * { 
      font-size: {{ bottom_text_size }}px;
    }  

    .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ bottom_button_padding_vertical }}px {{ bottom_button_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ bottom_button_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }    
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if full_width %} 
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-slider-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: 0rem !important;
        margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
        padding-left: 0rem !important;
        padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      }     
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-slider-{{ section.id }} {      
        margin-left: 0rem !important;
        margin-right: 0rem !important;
        padding-left: 0rem !important;
        padding-right: 0rem !important;
      }
    }
  </style>  
{% endif %}  

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .hero-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .hero-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_title_custom %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ slide_title_font.family }}, {{ slide_title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ slide_title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ slide_title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_button_custom %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ slide_button_font.family }}, {{ slide_button_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ slide_button_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ slide_button_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if bottom_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .hero-bottom-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ bottom_text_font.family }}, {{ bottom_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ bottom_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ bottom_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if bottom_button_custom %}
  <style>
    .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ bottom_button_font.family }}, {{ bottom_button_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ bottom_button_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ bottom_button_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .hero-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/11;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .hero-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .hero-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .hero-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/11;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/11;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif slide_image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif slide_image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/11;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif slide_image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif slide_image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_content_align == 'center' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: column;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_button_style == "non_outline" or slide_button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }} {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      background-color: {{ slide_button_bg_color }};
    }

    .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      background-color: {{ slide_button_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif slide_button_style == "outline" or slide_button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }} {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      background-color: {{ slide_button_bg_color }};
      border: {{ slide_button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ slide_button_border_color }};
    }

    .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      background-color: {{ slide_button_bg_hover_color }};
      border: {{ slide_button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ slide_button_border_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif slide_button_style == "link" %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if bottom_button_style == "non_outline" or bottom_button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
  <style>
    .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }} {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      background-color: {{ bottom_button_bg_color }};
    }

    .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      background-color: {{ bottom_button_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif bottom_button_style == "outline" or bottom_button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
  <style>
    .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }} {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      background-color: {{ bottom_button_bg_color }};
      border: {{ bottom_button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ bottom_button_border_color }};
    }

    .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      background-color: {{ bottom_button_bg_hover_color }};
      border: {{ bottom_button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ bottom_button_border_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif bottom_button_style == "link" %}
  <style>
    .hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_content_align == 'right' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: row-reverse;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif slide_content_align == 'center' %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slide_button_mt }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if image_hover == 'slide_image_hover' %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-images-{{ section.id }} .hero-slide-second-image-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .hero-slide-images-{{ section.id }} .hero-slide-first-image-{{ section.id }} {
        -webkit-animation: opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 0.3s linear;
        animation: opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 0.3s linear;  
      }
  
      .hero-slide-images-{{ section.id }}:hover .hero-slide-first-image-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
  
      .hero-slide-images-{{ section.id }}:hover .hero-slide-second-image-{{ section.id }} {
        -webkit-animation: opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 0.3s linear;
        animation: opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 0.3s linear;   
        display: block;
      } 
    }

    @keyframes opacity{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
      0% {
        opacity: 0;
      }
      100% {
        opacity: 1;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_hover == 'slide_image_zoom' %}
  <style>
    .hero-slide-images-{{ section.id }}:hover .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} img,
    .hero-slide-images-{{ section.id }}:hover .hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      transform: scale(1.1);
    }
  </style>  
{% endif %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .hero-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .hero-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .hero-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .hero-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ slider_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .hero-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .hero-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ slider_gap }}px;
    } 

    .hero-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / {{ slider_view }} - ({{ slider_gap }}px));
    }
  }
</style>


<div class="section-{{ section.id }} hero-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% if heading != blank %}
        <div class="hero-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</div>
      {% endif %}
      <div class="hero-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="hero-image-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if image != blank %}        
            <img src="{{ image | image_url }}" alt="{{ image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>    
          {% else %}   
            {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}         
          {% endif %}   
        </div>
        <div class="hero-content-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if text != blank %}
            <div class="hero-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ text }}</div>
          {% endif %}      
          <div class="hero-slide-buttons-{{ section.id }}">
            <button class="hero-slide-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
              <svg width="64" height="12" viewBox="0 0 64 12" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M59.2678 4.70711L55.9749 1.41421L57.3891 0L62.435 5.04594L63.1421 5.75305L62.435 6.46015L57.3891 11.5061L55.9749 10.0919L59.3596 6.70711H0V4.70711H59.2678Z" fill="black"/> </svg>
            </button>
            <button class="hero-slide-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
              <svg width="64" height="12" viewBox="0 0 64 12" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M59.2678 4.70711L55.9749 1.41421L57.3891 0L62.435 5.04594L63.1421 5.75305L62.435 6.46015L57.3891 11.5061L55.9749 10.0919L59.3596 6.70711H0V4.70711H59.2678Z" fill="black"/> </svg>
            </button>   
          </div>          
          <div class="hero-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
            <div class="hero-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper"
              data-gap="{{ slider_gap }}"
              data-gap-mobile="{{ slider_gap_mobile }}"
              data-view="{{ slider_view }}"
              data-view-mobile="{{ slider_view_mobile }}">
              <div class="swiper-wrapper">
                {% if products != blank %}
                  {% for product in products %}
                    <div class="hero-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                      <{% if product.url != blank %}a href="{{ product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="hero-slide-images-{{ section.id }}">                     
                        <div class="hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {% if image_hover == 'slide_image_hover' and product.media.size > 1 %}hero-slide-first-image-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">    
                          {% if product.featured_image != blank %}
                            <img src="{{ product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>            
                          {% else %}
                            {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                          {% endif %}  
                        </div>
                        {% if image_hover == 'slide_image_hover' and product.media.size > 1 %}
                          <div class="hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} hero-slide-second-image-{{ section.id }}">                             
                            {% if product.media.size > 1 %}
                              {% for media in product.media %}
                                {% if forloop.index == 2 %}
                                  <img src="{{ media | image_url }}" alt="{{ media.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                                {% endif %}
                              {% endfor %}
                            {% endif %}
                          </div>
                        {% endif %}
                      </{% if product.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
                      <div class="hero-slide-content-{{ section.id }}">                  
                        {% if product.title != blank %}
                          <h3 class="hero-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ product.title }}</h3>                
                        {% endif %}                
                        {% if slide_button != blank %}
                          <a href="{{ product.url }}" class="hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }}">    
                            <p class="hero-slide-button-inner-{{ section.id }}">
                            {{ slide_button }}
                            {% if slide_button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or slide_button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                                <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                                  <path d="M187.827 98.7858C188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.1761C188.419 97.8652 188.419 97.5663 188.704 97.5663C189 96.9566 189 96.6458 189 96.0361C189 95.4263 189 94.8166 188.704 94.5058C188.704 94.195 188.408 93.8961 188.123 93.5852C188.123 93.2744 187.827 93.2744 187.827 92.9755L103.287 4.21945C102.41 3.29889 101.533 3 100.668 3C99.791 3 98.6295 3.31083 98.0488 4.21945C97.1719 5.14 96.8872 6.06058 96.8872 6.96919C96.8872 7.88974 97.1833 9.10918 98.0488 9.7189L175.587 92.0539H6.79206C4.75371 92.0539 3 93.895 3 96.0351C3 98.1751 4.75365 100.016 6.79206 100.016H175.575L97.7543 182.042C96.2967 183.572 96.2967 186.322 97.7543 187.852C99.2119 189.383 101.831 189.383 103.288 187.852L187.827 98.7858Z" fill="black"></path>
                                  <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M188.607 97.5657C188.432 97.5657 188.365 97.6788 188.27 97.8382C188.211 97.9378 188.141 98.0554 188.027 98.1748C188.027 98.4734 188.027 98.4734 187.731 98.7839L103.281 187.759C101.825 189.287 99.2085 189.287 97.7524 187.759C96.2963 186.23 96.2963 183.483 97.7524 181.954L175.492 100.013L6.88489 100.013C4.8486 100.013 3.09677 98.1739 3.09677 96.036C3.09677 93.8982 4.84866 92.059 6.88489 92.059L175.504 92.059L98.0465 9.80878C97.182 9.19968 96.8862 7.9815 96.8862 7.0619C96.8862 6.15422 97.1706 5.2346 98.0465 4.315C98.6267 3.40732 99.787 3.0968 100.663 3.0968C101.527 3.0968 102.403 3.39539 103.279 4.315L187.731 92.9796C187.731 93.1274 187.804 93.2021 187.877 93.2774C187.952 93.3543 188.027 93.4319 188.027 93.5887C188.046 93.6098 188.066 93.6308 188.085 93.6518C188.338 93.9267 188.584 94.1935 188.606 94.4689C188.607 94.482 188.607 94.4951 188.607 94.5083C188.903 94.8188 188.903 95.4279 188.903 96.037C188.903 96.6461 188.903 96.9566 188.607 97.5657ZM191.489 93.2767C191.79 93.8661 191.89 94.4204 191.934 94.7363C192.001 95.2226 192 95.7194 192 95.9856L192 96.037C192 96.0544 192 96.0729 192 96.0926C192 96.3523 192.001 96.8096 191.924 97.2931C191.828 97.8884 191.64 98.41 191.393 98.9184L190.546 100.663H190.212C190.127 100.759 190.038 100.852 189.988 100.905L189.974 100.92L105.527 189.891C102.85 192.701 98.1865 192.704 95.51 189.895C94.1476 188.464 93.5636 186.587 93.5636 184.857C93.5636 183.128 94.1468 181.252 95.5071 179.822M191.489 93.2767C191.316 92.7908 191.078 92.4357 190.938 92.2406C190.903 92.1912 190.866 92.142 190.828 92.0939V91.7408L105.522 2.17912C104.076 0.661813 102.397 0 100.663 0C99.3914 0 97.0569 0.401401 95.6212 2.37737C94.3151 3.83819 93.7895 5.45521 93.7895 7.0619C93.7895 8.26663 94.1183 10.6061 95.9608 12.111L168.333 88.9622L6.88489 88.9622C2.9981 88.9622 0 92.3316 0 96.036C0 99.7405 2.99801 103.11 6.88489 103.11L168.285 103.11" fill="black"></path>
                                  <path d="M169.5 104L16.5 102.5V90H171L97.5 10.5V7L107.5 4.5C131.167 29.6667 180.2 81.5 187 87.5C193.8 93.5 191.5 99 189.5 101L105.5 184L94 181.5L169.5 104Z" fill="black"></path>
                                </svg>
                              {% endif %}
                            </p>
                          </a>
                        {% endif %}    
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  {% endfor %}
                {% else %}              
                  {% for block in section.blocks %}
                    <div class="hero-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">                     
                      <{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.custom_url }}"{% elsif block.settings.product != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="hero-slide-images-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.custom_first_image != blank %}
                          <div class="hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {% if block.settings.custom_second_image != blank and image_hover == 'slide_image_hover' %}hero-slide-first-image-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">    
                            {% if block.settings.custom_first_image != blank %}
                              <img src="{{ block.settings.custom_first_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.custom_first_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>            
                            {% else %}
                              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                            {% endif %}  
                          </div>  
                          {% if block.settings.custom_second_image != blank and image_hover == 'slide_image_hover' %}
                            <div class="hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} hero-slide-second-image-{{ section.id }}">
                              {% if block.settings.custom_second_image != blank %}
                                <img src="{{ block.settings.custom_second_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.custom_second_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>                   
                              {% else %}
                                {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                              {% endif %}
                            </div>
                          {% endif %}
                        {% elsif block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}  
                          <div class="hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {% if image_hover == 'slide_image_hover' and block.settings.product.media.size > 1 or block.settings.second_custom_image != blank %}hero-slide-first-image-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">    
                            {% if block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}
                              <img src="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>            
                            {% else %}
                              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                            {% endif %}  
                          </div>
                          {% if image_hover == 'slide_image_hover' and block.settings.product.media.size > 1 or block.settings.second_custom_image != blank %}
                            <div class="hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }} hero-slide-second-image-{{ section.id }}">
                              {% if block.settings.second_custom_image != blank %}
                                <img src="{{ block.settings.second_custom_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.second_custom_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>             
                              {% elsif block.settings.product.media.size > 1 %}
                                {% for media in block.settings.product.media %}
                                  {% if forloop.index == 2 %}
                                    <img src="{{ media | image_url }}" alt="{{ media.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                                  {% endif %}
                                {% endfor %}
                              {% endif %}
                            </div>
                          {% endif %}
                        {% else %}
                          <div class="hero-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                            {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}                       
                          </div>  
                        {% endif %}   
                      </{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank or block.settings.product != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>                                         
                      <div class="hero-slide-content-{{ section.id }}">                  
                        {% if block.settings.custom_title != blank %}  
                          <h3 class="hero-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.custom_title }}</h3>
                        {% elsif block.settings.product.title != blank %}
                          <h3 class="hero-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.title }}</h3>                
                        {% endif %}                
                        {% if slide_button != blank %}
                          <{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.custom_url }}"{% elsif block.settings.product != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="hero-slide-button-{{ section.id }}">    
                            <p class="hero-slide-button-inner-{{ section.id }}">
                            {{ slide_button }}
                            {% if slide_button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or slide_button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                                <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                                  <path d="M187.827 98.7858C188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.1761C188.419 97.8652 188.419 97.5663 188.704 97.5663C189 96.9566 189 96.6458 189 96.0361C189 95.4263 189 94.8166 188.704 94.5058C188.704 94.195 188.408 93.8961 188.123 93.5852C188.123 93.2744 187.827 93.2744 187.827 92.9755L103.287 4.21945C102.41 3.29889 101.533 3 100.668 3C99.791 3 98.6295 3.31083 98.0488 4.21945C97.1719 5.14 96.8872 6.06058 96.8872 6.96919C96.8872 7.88974 97.1833 9.10918 98.0488 9.7189L175.587 92.0539H6.79206C4.75371 92.0539 3 93.895 3 96.0351C3 98.1751 4.75365 100.016 6.79206 100.016H175.575L97.7543 182.042C96.2967 183.572 96.2967 186.322 97.7543 187.852C99.2119 189.383 101.831 189.383 103.288 187.852L187.827 98.7858Z" fill="black"></path>

                                  <path d="M169.5 104L16.5 102.5V90H171L97.5 10.5V7L107.5 4.5C131.167 29.6667 180.2 81.5 187 87.5C193.8 93.5 191.5 99 189.5 101L105.5 184L94 181.5L169.5 104Z" fill="black"></path>
                                </svg>
                              {% endif %}
                            </p>
                          </{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank or block.settings.product != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
                        {% endif %}    
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  {% endfor %}
                {% endif %}  
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>          
        </div>
      </div>
      {% if bottom_text != blank or bottom_button != blank %}
        <div class="hero-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if bottom_text != blank %}
            <div class="hero-bottom-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ bottom_text }}</div>
          {% endif %}
          {% if bottom_button != blank %}
            <{% if bottom_button_url != blank %}a href="{{ bottom_button_url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="hero-bottom-button-{{ section.id }}">    
              <p class="hero-bottom-button-inner-{{ section.id }}">
              {{ bottom_button }}
              {% if bottom_button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or bottom_button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                  <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                    <path d="M187.827 98.7858C188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.1761C188.419 97.8652 188.419 97.5663 188.704 97.5663C189 96.9566 189 96.6458 189 96.0361C189 95.4263 189 94.8166 188.704 94.5058C188.704 94.195 188.408 93.8961 188.123 93.5852C188.123 93.2744 187.827 93.2744 187.827 92.9755L103.287 4.21945C102.41 3.29889 101.533 3 100.668 3C99.791 3 98.6295 3.31083 98.0488 4.21945C97.1719 5.14 96.8872 6.06058 96.8872 6.96919C96.8872 7.88974 97.1833 9.10918 98.0488 9.7189L175.587 92.0539H6.79206C4.75371 92.0539 3 93.895 3 96.0351C3 98.1751 4.75365 100.016 6.79206 100.016H175.575L97.7543 182.042C96.2967 183.572 96.2967 186.322 97.7543 187.852C99.2119 189.383 101.831 189.383 103.288 187.852L187.827 98.7858Z" fill="black"></path>

                  </svg>
                {% endif %}
              </p>
            </{% if bottom_button_url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
          {% endif %}   
        </div>
      {% endif %}     
    </div>
</div>

<script>
  function loadSwiper(callback) {
    if (window.Swiper) {
      callback();
    } else {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js";
      script.onload = callback;
      document.head.appendChild(script);
    }
  }

  function initHero19(sectionId) {
    const slider = new Swiper(`.hero-slider-${sectionId}`, {
      speed: 300,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: `.hero-slide-btn-next-${sectionId}`,
        prevEl: `.hero-slide-btn-prev-${sectionId}`,
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.hero-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.gapMobile || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.hero-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.viewMobile || 1),
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.hero-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.hero-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.view || 3),
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.hero-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.gap || 0),
          slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.hero-slider-${sectionId}`).dataset.view || 3),
        }
      }
    });
  }

  function initializeAllHero19Sections() {
    const sections = document.querySelectorAll('[id^="shopify-section-"]');
    sections.forEach(section => {
      if (section.querySelector('.hero-{{ section.id }}')) {
        const sectionId = section.id.replace('shopify-section-', '');
        loadSwiper(() => initHero19(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }

  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initializeAllHero19Sections);
  } else {
    initializeAllHero19Sections();
  }

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', (event) => {
      const sectionId = event.detail.sectionId;
      if (event.target.querySelector('.hero-{{ section.id }}')) {
        loadSwiper(() => initHero19(sectionId));
      }
    });
  }
</script>

text.default: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers.
text.label: Text

products.label: Products
products.description: Leave this list empty to display products from blocks

slide_button.label: Button label
slide_button.description: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

bottom_text.default: Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.
bottom_text.label: Text

bottom_button.label: Button
bottom_button.description: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
